q_en: Which cutting tasks use Cotton Fabric?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse material IDs that use the material "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT cutting_task_id FROM cutting_material_allocation WHERE warehouse_material_id IN ('1');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that have allocated the warehouse materials using "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.id IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '19', '21', '28', '31', '34');
steps.description: Retrieve the details of cutting tasks that use "Cotton Fabric"

response:
